dcterms:creator: Luyen Le Ngoc
Marie-Hélène Abel
Philippe Gouspillou
dcterms:description: An RDF knowledge graph that models vehicle descriptions and user preferences, facilitating the construction of a constraint-based recommender system for vehicle sales.
dcterms:title: RDF Knowledge Graph for Vehicle Descriptions and User Preferences

dcterms:creator: Luyen Le Ngoc
Marie-Hélène Abel
Philippe Gouspillou
dcterms:description: A collection of ontologies from the e-commerce domain used to create a knowledge base for vehicle sales.
dcterms:title: Ontologies from the E-commerce Domain

dcterms:creator: Luyen Le Ngoc
Marie-Hélène Abel
Philippe Gouspillou
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of RDF triples that represent various entities and relationships in the context of vehicle sales and user preferences.
dcterms:title: RDF Triples Dataset

dcterms:creator: Luyen Le Ngoc
Marie-Hélène Abel
Philippe Gouspillou
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes user preferences and vehicle descriptions, structured to support a constraint-based recommender system.
dcterms:title: User Preferences and Vehicle Descriptions
